description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr17154 [Akiyama Tadashi]`s children`s manga Hana Kappa-kun.
Hanakappa-kun is a story about Hanakappa, a kappa (mythical Japanese monster) with a flower (hana) growing on his head, his family, and the village he lives in.
Note: While 2 episodes were aired daily a lot of times the 2nd episode was a reairing of a previous episode. At times even both segments were.
